scripts.dev:api: yarn docker:mongo && cd api && yarn dev:cypress
scripts.cypress:open: wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cd web && yarn cypress open
scripts.cypress:run: wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cd web && yarn cypress run
scripts.test:api: yarn docker:mongo && cd api && yarn test
scripts.test:p2p: yarn docker:mongo && yarn run-p --race dev:api dev:web cypress:open
scripts.test:p2p:headless: yarn docker:mongo && yarn run-p --race dev:api dev:web cypress:run
